name: Ultimate Duck Hunting: Hunting & Retrieving Ducks
name_original: Ultimate Duck Hunting: Hunting & Retrieving Ducks
description:
Ultimate Duck Hunting: Hunting & Retrieving Ducks is a sports-arcade game developed by Mid Carolina Media. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Mid Carolina Media.
Ultimate Duck Hunting: Hunting & Retrieving Ducks is available on PC.
